question: For Which card Paytm Payments Bank partners with NPCI recently?
explanation: Paytm Payments Bank (PPB) partnered with the National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI) to launch a RuPay-powered digital debit card. The RuPay-powered digital debit card will be issued to all customers who have opened their bank accounts with PPB. Airtel launched India's first live payments bank. Paytm is the second such service to be launched in the country.
